content.body: when the spec says "is an AsyncGenerator" (which isn't dfn-ed to anywhere), i assume that should link to "An AsyncGenerator is an instance of an async generator function and conforms to both the AsyncIterator and AsyncIterable interfaces." - which means `x instanceof %AsyncGeneratorFunction%` as well as having a specific list of callable properties?
